info.title: OPERA Cloud Sales Event Management API
info.description:
APIs to cater for Event Management functionality in OPERA Cloud.

The Events feature in OPERA Cloud is designed to manage any kind of catering activity. Events can be as simple as a one-hour reception or more complex, such as a three-day business meeting with meals, breaks, and specific meeting functionSpaceDetails with setupCode and resource requirements. Any group function can be an Event.

Compatible with OPERA Cloud release 22.3.

This document and all content within is available under the Universal Permissive License v 1.0 (https://oss.oracle.com/licenses/upl). Copyright (c) 2020, 2023 Oracle and/or its affiliates.

get.description:
Use this API to retrieve multiple Events for a specific hotel, you can narrow the results using different search criteria such as event eventStartDate and eventEndDate dates, and block name.

OperationId:getEventsMultipleHotels

parameters.name: hotelIds
parameters.description: This is the Hotel Code of the Event

parameters.name: eventStartDate
parameters.description: The starting value of the date range.

parameters.name: eventEndDate
parameters.description: The ending value of the date range.

parameters.name: blockId
parameters.description: Block ID linked to the Catering Event

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Unique ID for the catering event

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Simple type for block instructions to be used in requests for fetching blocks. Valid status values are Group, Source, TravelAgent, Contact, Company.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Attached profile name

parameters.name: attachedProfileId
parameters.description: A unique identifying numeric value assigned to a profile utilized to fetch events associated to blocks linked to the profile.

parameters.name: blockName
parameters.description: Block Name.

parameters.name: eventStatusCodes
parameters.description: Status Codes associated with the events to be fetched.

parameters.name: eventTypeCodes
parameters.description: Event Type Codes associated with the events to be fetched.

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include inactive events in search result.

parameters.name: includeAlternateEvents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include the alternate events in the search result.

parameters.name: includeOpportunities
parameters.description: If set to true, the results will include opportunities. If this flag is not provided it will be considered false and exclude opportunities.

parameters.name: includeSubEvents
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include the sub events in the search result.

parameters.name: cateringEventOrderBy
parameters.description: A collection of supported list of order by for search catering events.

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Instructions to fetch details information about the selected event. The BlocksInfo fetch instructions will retain a limited amount of data for the associated block.  The Indicators instruction will provide a count.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

get.description:
This API will allow you to retrieve an event by specifying the event ID in the path. Event details will be returned. You can also add fetch instructions to specify what event data you would like returned in the response. If you don't know the eventID, please use getEvents API to find the event and it's respective eventID.

OperationId:getEvent

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the event

parameters.name: hotelId
parameters.description: Unique ID of a hotel

parameters.name: fetchInstructions
parameters.description: Instruction to fetch all eligible master events for the selected event

authKey.description: Bearer token that needs to be passed which is generated post user authentication

x-hotelid.name: x-hotelid
x-hotelid.description: Mandatory parameter to identify the hotel code where the eventEndDate user is logged in

x-hubid.name: x-hubid
x-hubid.description: x-hubid is a logical grouping of multiple properties that allows api consumers to manage data from a group of properties. This x-hubid is a valid list of hub codes configured in OPERA to which the user has access. Rest APIs without hotelId in the operation path can support hub level integration using x-hubid

translatableDescription.description: Translatable Description of the Catering Revenue Types.

inactive.description: Indicates if the Revenue type Code is inactive.

revenueDetails.description: Collection of Revenue details assoicated to a Revenue Type (Additional Details)

translationTextType200.description: Contains Multiple translated texts and language codes.

defaultText.description: Default text with Character length from 0 to 200.

translations.description: List of translated text and language codes.

revenueTypeDetailsType.description: List of Revenue details assoicated to a Revenue Type (Additional Details)

revenueTypeDetailType.description: Details type provides information about Catering Revenue Type Details.

hotelId.description: Hotel Code is used to set associated revenue type details.

instanceLink.description: Metadata describing link description objects that MAY appear in the JSON instance representation.

href.description: URI [RFC3986] or URI Template [RFC6570]. If the value is set to URI Template, then the "templated" property must be set to true.

rel.description: Name of the link relation that, in addition to the type property, can be used to retrieve link details. For example, href or profile.

templated.description: Boolean flag that specifies that "href" property is a URI or URI Template. If the property is a URI template, set this value to true. By default, this value is false.

method.description: HTTP method for requesting the target of the link.

targetSchema.description: Link to the metadata of the resource, such as JSON-schema, that describes the resource expected when dereferencing the target resource..

operationId.description: The operationId of the path you can call to follow this link.  This allows you to look up not only the path and method, but the description of that path and any parameters you need to supply.

title.description: Exact copy of the "summary" field on the linked operation.

warningsType.description: Used in conjunction with the Success elementSpace to define a business error.

warningType.description: Used when a message has been successfully processed to report any warnings or business errors that occurred.

shortText.description: An abbreviated version of the error in textual format.

code.description: If present, this refers to a table of coded values exchanged between applications to identify errors or warnings.

docURL.description: If present, this URL refers to an online description of the error that occurred.

status.description: If present, recommended values are those enumerated in the ErrorRS, (NotProcessed Incomplete Complete Unknown) however, the data type is designated as string data, recognizing that trading partners may identify additional status conditions not included in the enumeration.

tag.description: If present, this attribute may identify an unknown or misspelled tag that caused an error in processing. It is recommended that the Tag attribute use XPath notation to identify the location of a tag in the event that more than one tag of the same name is present in the document. Alternatively, the tag name alone can be used to identify missing data [Type=ReqFieldMissing].

recordId.description: If present, this attribute allows for batch processing and the identification of the record that failed amongst a group of records. This value may contain a concatenation of a unique failed transaction ID with specific record(s) associated with that transaction.

type.description: The Warning elementSpace MUST contain the Type attribute that uses a recommended set of values to indicate the warning type. The validating XSD can expect to accept values that it has NOT been explicitly coded for and process them by using Type ="Unknown".

rph.description: Reference Place Holder used as an index for this warning.

exceptionDetailType.title: Error Detail
exceptionDetailType.description: Complex type that contains error details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

o:errorDetails.description: Details of the error message, consisting of a hierarchical tree structure.

errorInstance.title: Error Instance Details
errorInstance.description: Complex type that contains error instance details for a REST call.

type.description: Absolute URI [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type.  When dereferenced, it SHOULD provide a human-readable summary of the problem (for example, using HTML).

title.description: Short, human-readable summary of the problem.  The summary SHOULD NOT change for subsequent occurrences of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

status.description: HTTP status code for this occurrence of the problem, set by the origin server.

detail.description: Human-readable description specific to this occurrence of the problem.

o:errorCode.description: Application error code, which is different from HTTP error code.

o:errorPath.description: Path to the problem at the resource or property level.

value.description: Used for Character Strings, length 0 to 2000.

blockInfo.description: Type contains the primary details for a block and it's children details.

masterInfoList.description: Refer to Generic common types document

eventSummary.description: Contains master/sub-events or standalone events summary information

totalPages.description: Evaluated total page count based on the requested max fetch count.

offset.description: Index or initial index of the set(page) being requested. If the index goes out of the bounds of the total set count then no data will be returned.

limit.description: Indicates maximum number of records a Web Service should return.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

blockIdList.description: Unique ID to represent the block that the event belongs to.

functionSpaceDetails.description: The function space functionSpaceDetails where the event takes place.

rentalAmount.description: Rental amount for the event function space.

functionSpaceSetup.description: Setup Style selected for the Function Space.

eventStatus.description: Status of the event. Examples are INQ, TEN, DEF, etc.

waitlistReturnStatus.description: This is to show the turned status of an event

cateringStatusType.description: Event Status Type Flag to identify if the Catering event is cancelled, lost, actual, etc. Examples are C(Cancelled), L (Lost), R (Refused), A (Actual).

cateringStatusDeductInventory.description: Flag to indicate if the Catering event deducts resources from inventory.

cateringStatusReturnToInventory.description: Flag to indicate if the Catering event returns resources to inventory.

setupTime.description: Event space setupCode time in minutes.

tearDownTime.description: Event space tear down time in minutes.

masterEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is a master event.

subEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is a sub event.

packageEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is part of a package.

alternateEvent.description: Flag to indicate if the event is booked as a backup for another event.

displayDoorCard.description: Flag to indicate if the doorcard has been selected to display on reports or external readerboard systems.

doorCard.description: The doorcard to be displayed on reports or external readerboard systems.

excludeFromForecast.description: Flag to indicate if the event revenue should be excluded from the forecast.

useForecastRevenue.description: Flag to indicate whether to only use the forecasted values when reporting, regardless of whether resources are booked on an event.

minimumOccupancy.description: Minimum Occupancy for the SetupCode of Catring Event.

maximumOccupancy.description: Maximum Occupancy for the SetupCode of Catring Event.

discountPercentage.description: Discount Percentage applied to Rent Amount.

loudEvent.description: Indicates whether the event is expected to be noisy and might possibly disturb other events.

eventShared.description: Flag to indicate if the event is shareable with other events.

shareable.description: Flag to indicate if the event functionSpaceDetails is shareable.

packageCode.description: Package Code of the Event if it has a Package Enabled in it.

includeSpaceInPackage.description: Flag to indicate if the event space is associated from the Package.

hotelId.description: Hotel where the event is booked.

blockHotelCode.description: Hotel where the Block is created for the event.

hasPostings.description: Indicates whether the event has postings.

blockHasPostings.description: Indicates whether any event in the block has postings.

hasPartialPostings.description: Indicates whether the event has posted some charges, but not all.

allPosted.description: Indicates whether the event has posted all charges.

nothingPosted.description: Indicates that none of the charges on the event have been posted.

eventStartDate.description: The starting value of the time span.

eventEndDate.description: The ending value of the time span.

type.description: Type of event. Examples are LUN, DIN, etc.

eventName.description: Name of event. This is used to describe the event.

cateringCurrency.description: Currency code when base currency of the property is different than the catering currency.

cateringQuotedCurrency.description: Currency code which is been quoted for Catering Events

eventIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the event

addtionalCodeInfoType.description: Holds name of additional code information

name.description: Holds name of additional code information

value.description: Holds value of additional code information

event.description: Object containing details of the event.

userId.description: User Id of the Opera User

hotelReservationType.description: The Reservation class contains the current reservation being created or altered.

reservationIdList.description: Used to provide PMS and/or CRS identifiers.

sourceOfSale.description: Point of Sale of reservation. Identifies the entity/channel who made the reservation.

reservationGuests.description: Collection of guests associated with the reservation.

sharedGuests.description: Collection of guests who share this reservation.

additionalGuestInfo.description: Entry Date into the country. (Croatian Requirements).

reservationProfiles.description: Collection of guests associated with the reservation.

commissionPayoutTo.description: If not null, reservation is considered to pay out commission to either Travel Agent, Source or both.

reservationAwards.description: Collection of Awards,Certificates for the guest profile.

trackItItems.description: Collection of TrackIt Items available for that reservation

shares.description: Collection of share reservation available for that reservation

locators.description: Collection of Locators available for that reservation

attachments.description: Collection of attachments available for that reservation

webRegistrationCards.description: Collection of Web Registration Cards available for that reservation

serviceRequests.description: Collection of Service Requests available for that reservation

prepaidCards.description: Collection of Prepaid Cards available for that reservation

profileAwards.description: Collection of profile awards available for that reservation

reservationPackages.description: A Service object represents a non-functionSpaceDetails product provided to guests. Service products may have associated inventory and charges.

inventoryItems.description: A collection of inventory items attached to a reservation.

comments.description: List of Notes for the Guest related to the reservation.

guestComments.description: List of Notes for the Guest related to the profile.

guestMemberships.description: List of Memberships for the Guest related to the reservation.

reservationPaymentMethods.description: A collection of Payment Method objects.

reservationPolicies.description: A collection of Cancellation Penalties objects.

cashiering.description: Holds cashiering related information for the reservation.

linkedReservation.description: Reservations related to the current Reservation.

reservationIndicators.description: Indicators of additional information attached to the reservation

waitlist.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was waitlisted. This could hold information as history even if reservation is no more in Waitlist status.

cancellation.description: Information regarding why reservation has been/was cancelled. This could hold information as history even if reservation is no more in in Cancelled status.

cancellationNo.description: Cancellation Number given when reservation was last cancelled.

date.description: Date when reservation was last cancelled.

catering.description: Catering event information if reservation is associated with the catering event.

statisticalClassification.description: Catering event information if reservation is associated with the catering event.

lockHandle.description: An id representing the record lock for this reservation. When passed, update operation will verify that this lock is still valid.

overrideInstructions.description: List of overrides done for the reservation.

queue.description: Information about the time and duration this reservation was on Queue for Checkin.

allowedActions.description: Collection of allowed actions for the reservation.

transactionDiversions.description: List of transaction diversions attached to the reservation.

advanceCheckIn.description: Information relating to Reservation's Advance Checked In state and Expected Time of Return

accessRestrictionMessage.description: Configurable Access Restriction Message for Excluded Block or Rate Code.

eCertificates.description: List of ECertificates attached to the reservation.

customNameValueDetail.description: List of Custom Name Value Information attached to the reservation.

customChargeExemptionDetails.description: List of Custom Charge Exemptions attached to the reservation.

folios.description: This elementSpace returns any automatically generated folios during check-in, based on the Fetch Instruction "AutoFolios". When the parameter "Auto Generate Credit Bill for Deposit upon Check In" is enabled, during check-in credit bills are automatically generated for the deposits. The generated credit bill details are returned so that user can preview/print the folio. For some countries like Portugal, it is mandatory to print the folio and hence this information is needed

autoBorrowFromHouse.description: This flag will force to borrow from house if borrow required for number of rooms requested, this will only applicable when reservation is attached to a Block.

overrideExternalChecks.description: Forcefully override the create/update action on the Reservation. For real-time CRS interfaces, this elementSpace is used as force selling indicator in case of Create or Update Reservation

roomStayReservation.description: Boolean True if this reservation is reserving rooms. False if it is only reserving services.

reservationStatus.description: Indicates the Actual status of the reservation.

computedReservationStatus.description: Indicates the Computed status of the reservation.

walkIn.description: When true, indicates the reservation is for a guest that walks-in without a reservation. When false, the reservation is not a walk-in.

printRate.description: Indicates whether to show the rate or not on a printed document which includes the rate.

creatorId.description: ID of creator. The creator could be a software system identifier or an identifier of an employee resposible for the creation.

lastModifierId.description: Identifies the last software system or person to modify a record.

purgeDate.description: Date an item will be purged from a database (e.g., from a live database to an archive).

createBusinessDate.description: Business Date when the reservation was created.

reinstateDate.description: Business Date when the reservation was last reinstated.

party.description: Party/PartyCode when reservation is part of a party(a small group).

primaryEnrollmentResort.description: Name Of the Resort/Hotel for the primary enrollment

primaryEnrollmentChain.description: Name of the Chain for the primary enrollment

displayColor.description: The color to display this reservation on functionSpaceDetails grid displays.

markAsRecentlyAccessed.description: Mark this reservation as recently accessed.

overrideInventoryCheck.description: Indicates to Override the Room Inventory Check if applicable.

accessRestriction.description: Indicates user restriction on the reservation based on the Access exclusion functionality such as Restriction on Changes, Cancellation or both.

upgradeEligible.description: Indicates whether the reservation is eligible for upgrade.

allowMobileCheckout.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for self-checkout by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile checkout yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

allowMobileViewFolio.description: Attribute AllowMobileViewFolio is set to true when the reservation is eligible for viewing folio using mobile device.

allowPreRegistration.description: Flag containing true or false value for reservation to be eligible for prior check in by guest using mobile device . Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is eligible for mobile check in yes / no. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

optedForCommunication.description: Flag containing true or false value to determine if the guest has opted for communications pertaining to this reservation.Pass the 'true' or 'false' values when creating / modifying reservation to indicate whether a reservation is marked for communication. Upon fetch, the current state of the flag will show true or false.

chargeCardNumber.description: This attribute represents Hotel charge card number. This number is generated automatically in OPERA when a reservation is created in OPERA. It is part of a functionality that provide the guest with the convenience of placing all their charges directly on their reservation folio.

overrideOutOfServiceCheck.description: Indicates to Override the Room Out Of Service Check if applicable.

associatedResType.description: Information regarding associated reservations to the reservation.

parentReservation.description: Stores Unique ID of the parent reservation.

originalMultiRoomRes.description: Stores Unique ID of the original multi functionSpaceDetails reservation from which this reservation is split off.

sourceOfSaleType.description: Point of Sale of reservation. Identifies the entity/channel who made the reservation.

sourceType.description: Type of entity/channel who made the reservation..

sourceCode.description: The entity/channel who made the reservation.

registrationNumber.description: Registration Number of the reservation for the current day.

currentRoomInfo.description: Room information of the reservation for the current day.

expectedTimes.description: The Expected Arrival and Departure Times.

originalTimeSpan.description: The Original Time Span(Arrival, Departure) which covers the Room Stay. In case of Rolling No Show TimeSpan's StratDate moves forward but OriginalTimeSpan's StratDate remains the same.

guarantee.description: The guarantee information associated to the Room Stay. A maximum of 5 occurances are available for use depending on the context.

promotion.description: Promotions applied to the reservation to get the promotional rate.

total.description: The total amount charged for the Room Stay.

totalPoints.description: The total number of Points charged for the Room Stay.

multiValueAttrs.description: Informative indicators indicating different values of an attribute exists over the stay.

upsellInfo.description: Indicates Upsell Information to be applied on Reservation.

mobileNotifications.description: Denotes the status of Room Ready and Key Ready messages.

roomNumberLocked.description: When true, indicates a functionSpaceDetails number cannot be changed. When false, indicates a functionSpaceDetails number may be changed.

printRate.description: This control whether rate info will be printed in confirmation letter.

ownerReservationType.description: Indicates whether reservation is for Unit/Room Owner or Authorized User. If this attribute is not define it is a regular/rental reservation.

primaryShareType.description: This is populated in case of primary share scenario. This indicates whether this reservation is primary or non primary. Changes or postings to the 'non-primary' share reservation is not allowed.

remoteCheckInAllowed.description: Indicates whether the reservation is pre-registered for internet check-in or not.

bookingMedium.description: Classifies the medium(Channel field on reservation screen) through which the reservation is made.

availableUpsellOfferCount.description: Number of Upsell Offers Available for this stay. This will only be populated if the Upsell Instruction is included in the Allowed Instruction request

currentRoomInfoType.description: Room information of the reservation for the current day.

roomViewCode.description: Represents the functionSpaceDetails view code like City view, River view, Ocean view etc.

stayProfiles.description: Profile associated with the functionSpaceDetails Stay.

awards.description: Membership Awards code applied on the reservation.

foreignExchange.description: Exchange Type information for the postings.

reservationBlock.description: Key information about the block for this reservation.

roomRateInfo.description: Information about the Room Rate Combination.

mealPlans.description: Meal plan codes for rate plan code.

eventStartDate.description: The starting value of the date range.

eventEndDate.description: The ending value of the date range.

sourceCode.description: To specify where the business came from e.g. radio, newspaper ad, etc.

roomId.description: A string value representing the unique identification of a functionSpaceDetails.

pseudoRoom.description: True indicates as pseudo functionSpaceDetails type. This is usually used for a posting master reservation.

roomTypeCharged.description: Room Type used for the Rate calculation.

commissionCode.description: Commission Code applicable for commission calculation for Travel Agent/Company.

commissionable.description: Indicates Commission is applicable for commission calculation for Travel Agent/Company.

houseUseOnly.description: Indicates this reservation is for House use.

complimentary.description: Indicates this reservation rate is complimentary.

inventoryLender.description: Indicates whether the functionSpaceDetails type inventory was taken from the allotment or House availability.

rateGroup.description: For RatePlanSet equals BESTAVAILABLERATE, in case Rate Groups are enabled the elementSpace provides the rate group for the rate plan code.

bogoDiscount.description: Indicates if the Rate Code has BOGO(Bye one Get one) indicator.

rateLevel.description: Rate plan type like Corporate,Regular,Military,Weekend etc.

taxIncluded.description: If true, indicates if tax is included in the rate code.

amountAfterTax.description: The total amount including all associated taxes (e.g., sales tax, VAT, GST or any associated tax).

currencyCode.description: The code specifying a monetary unit. Use ISO 4217, three alpha code.

currencySymbol.description: The symbol for the currency, e.g, for currencyCode USD the symbol is $.

decimalPlaces.description: Indicates the number of decimal places for a particular currency. This is equivalent to the ISO 4217 standard "minor unit". Typically used when the amount provided includes the minor unit of currency without a decimal point (e.g., USD 8500 needs DecimalPlaces="2" to represent $85).

rateOverride.description: When true indicates that the rate amount has been overridden.

baseAmount.description: The rate's base price. Amount excluding price for any add to rate combine line package attached to the rate.Also excludes any discounts

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

type.description: Used to indicate if the amount is inclusive or exclusive of other charges, such as taxes, or is cumulative (amounts have been added to each other).

code.description: Code identifying the fee (e.g.,agency fee, municipality fee).

fee.description: An individual fee or service charge.

rateRange.description: Rate Range details like maximum rate amount and minimum rate amount in each available rate category.

amountType.description: Base charge and additional charges related to a functionSpaceDetails that includes such things as additional guest amounts, cancel fees, etc. Also includes Discount percentages, total amount, and the rate description.

additionalGuestAmounts.description: Collection of incremental charges per age qualifying code for additional guests. Amount charged for additional occupant is with respect to age group of the base guests.

discount.description: Discount percentage and/or Amount, code and textual reason for discount

shareRatePercentage.description: Indicates the share rate percentage for the reservation if set to CUSTOMSPLIT.

shareDistributionInstruction.description: Last rate share distribution instruction applied on share reservation daily rate segment.

total.description: The total amount charged for this rate including additional occupant amounts and fees.

requiredPoints.description: The Points contains the number of points required to book a particular functionSpaceDetails type.

effectiveRate.description: The reservation effective amount charged for the accommodation or service (i.e. base amount + amount for Add to Rate Combine Line packages) per unit of time

eventStartDate.description: The starting value of the date range.

eventEndDate.description: The ending value of the date range.

discountType.description: Identifies and provides details about the discount. This allows for both percentages and flat amounts. If one field is used, the other should be zero/not specified since logically.

currencyCode.description: Provides a currency code to reflect the currency in which an amount may be expressed.

discountCode.description: Specifies the type of discount (e.g., No condition, LOS, Deposit or Total amount spent).

shareDistributionInstructionType.description: The type of Rate Amount Change to be done on the Sharer reservation. This can be FULL -> Full Rate for each Sharer. SPLIT-> Split the Rate amount between Sharer Reservations. ENTIRE -> This Sharer will get the total amount of the rate code for all the Sharer Reservations.

rateRangeType.description: Rate Range details like maximum rate amount and minimum rate amount in each available rate category.

base.description: The base amount charged for the accommodation or service.

profile.description: Provides detailed information regarding either a company or a customer profile.

guestCountsType.description: A collection of GuestCount by age group.

childAges.description: Defines Children's Ages. Number of children ages mentioned may mot match with children counts.

childBuckets.description: Defines children counts with Age Qualifying Group(Child Bucket#1) classification.

childAgesType.description: Age of a child in years.

upgradeRoomType.description: Room Type after the Upgrade Award.

awardCode.description: Membership Award code applied on the reservation.

effectiveDate.description: Effective Exchange date for the foreign currency posting.

mealPlanCodeType.description: Meal plan codes associated with the rate codes.

included.description: Represents if the meal plan code is included in rate code or not.

breakfastIncluded.description: Represents if the meal plan code is available for breakfast or not.

lunchIncluded.description: Represents if the meal plan code is available for lunch or not.

dinnerIncluded.description: Represents if the meal plan code is available for dinner or not.

rentalCode.description: The Rate Code of the Reservation before it was upgraded

totalAmount.description: Total Amount of the reservation before it was upgraded.

roomType.description: Original Reservation Room Type before being upgraded.

upsellInfo.description: Information of a reservation during the process of upgrade.

totalUpsellMoneyAmount.description: Total Amount that was charged including upsell.

firstNightUpsellAmount.description: First Night Total Amount including Upsell.

totalActualRateAmount.description: Actual Total Room Rate for the Target Upsell Room Type.

roomLongDescription.description: Detail description of the Room Type.

percentageSavings.description: Percentage savings resulting from accepting upsell offer. This will be calculated as the ratio of the amount saved by accepting the upsell offer to the actual functionSpaceDetails rate (i.e. functionSpaceDetails rate when upsell is not offered)

upsellDate.description: The date on which reservation is upgraded.

resMobileNotificationsType.description: Contains the status of Room Ready and Key Ready messages.

roomReady.description: Denotes the status of Room Ready message. It can have one of the values:PENDING, COMPLETED or FAILED

keyReady.description: Denotes the status of Key Ready message. It can have one of the values:PENDING, COMPLETED or FAILED

checkoutMessageReceived.description: Indicates if the Mobile checkout message is received.

requiresAction.description: Indicates if user action is required. The action could be for sending Room Ready or Key Ready Notification. It could also be for initiating Checkout

errorMessage.description: Error message when Mobile Notification has failed.

communicationStatusType.description: Enum to denote the Status of Readiness messages sent to Guest Devices.

authorizerUserName.description: Application user name of the authorizer

resGuestType.description: A collection of ResGuest objects, identifying the guests associated with this reservation. Which guests are in which functionSpaceDetails is determined by each RoomStays ResGuestRPHs collection.

profileInfo.description: A collection of Profiles or Unique IDs of Profiles.

profileIdList.description: Unique identifiers for the Profile for both internal and external systems. In case of Travel Agent the IATA code and in case of Company can be any form of identifier as id.

profile.description: Provides detailed information regarding either a company or a customer profile.

customStaySchedule.description: This user defined schedule lets you enter a posting rhythm over a 14-day period, starting with the arrival date, by assigning the day (number) within a guest stay for posting this package price.

customNightSchedule.description: The eventStartDate and eventEndDate of the posting period is determined as follows: If the package is attached to a rate code: The period starts with the date when the rate code to which the package is attached becomes effective for the stay. The period ends with the date of the last night for that rate code (or the last night of the stay if the rate code remains in effect until the departure date). If the package is attached separately to the reservation: The Begin Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the eventStartDate date for the period. The End Date specified on the reservation when the package was attached is the eventEndDate date for the period. If no Begin Date and/or End Date are specified when the package is attached to the reservation, the Begin Date is assumed to be the arrival date and the End Date is assumed to be the departure date of the reservation, irrespective of when the package is attached to the reservation.

reference.description: Free text field for reference information.

status.description: The Status Code for outbound WS call.

statusDescription.description: The Status Description for outbound WS call.

eCertificateType.description: ECertificate Type where value can be PROMOTION,AWARD,BENEFIT and OTHER

eCertificateClassficationType.description: Enumeration of the different type of Ecertificate.

nameValueDetailType.description: Detailed information returned during name value search.

name.description: Contains unique key which represents for record field.

usageInstruction.description: Contains value(s) to identify the reports to include the collected information in e.g. PFH=Print Folio Header, PFD=Print Folio Detail.

originName.description: Contains origin i.e. Reseravtion, Profile, Folio or FinTrx.

id.description: A unique identifying value assigned by the creating system. The ID attribute may be used to reference a primary-key value within a database or in a particular implementation.

type.description: A reference to the type of object defined by the UniqueID elementSpace.

customChargeQuantity.description: Contains exemption quantity for the stay. When this value is configured, daily exemption quantities are not permitted.

customChargeDates.description: Contains exemption detail information for each date.

excludedDates.description: Contains list of dates which are not valid for custom charge exemptions.

propertyExemption.description: Flag specifying if custom charge exemptions is property level or not.

customChargeQuantityType.description: Contains quantity of custom charge exemptions.

quantity.description: Contains number of Custom Charge Exemption for a day.

available.description: Indicates if Custom Charges Exemption information is editable.

customChargeExemptionDatesType.description: Contains List of Custom Charge Exemption information for a day.

customChargeExemptionDateType.description: Contains Custom Charge Exemption information for a day.

quantity.description: Contains number of Custom Charge Exemption for a day.

excludedDatesType.description: Contains list of dates which are valid for custom charge exemptions.

exclusionReasonType.description: Custom Charge has already been Processed for this date within the reservation stay.

foliosShortInfoType.description: This type contains a list of generated bills for a reservation.

folioShortInfoType.description: This type contains information of generated bills.

folioNo.description: Folio No of the bill generated.

folioType.description: Folio type of the bill generated.

folioView.description: The folio window where the settlement is applied.

autoGenerated.description: Flag to indicate if the folio is auto generated or not.

internalFolioWindowID.description: Internal window ID which is unique to the reservation. This ID can only be used for reference.

invoiceNo.description: Invoice No after the folio is generated. Same invoice number may be referred in multiple folios

folioStatusType.description: The Folio Status Example: DEPOSIT folio, VOID folio or the default OK folio status.

resAccessRestrictionType.description: Indicates any Updates/Changes on the reservation as well as Reservation Cancellation are not allowed.

blocksType.description: A collection of Block objects or Unique IDs of Blocks.

blockInfo.description: A collection of Blocks or Unique IDs of Blocks.

block.description: Provides detailed information regarding a block.

hasMore.description: Indicates whether all the records are included in the response or not. Absence of the attribute values should be consider as all rows fetched in the response.

tags.name: EventManagement
tags.description: The Event APIs will allow you to retrieve, create, manage and delete events and related event functionality such as event resources, catering packages and even event waitlists.
